manifest.name: nuxi

scripts.release: pnpm test && changelogen --release && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.test: pnpm lint && pnpm test:types && pnpm build && pnpm test:dist

manifest.readme: # Nuxt CLI (nuxi) ⚡️ [Nuxt](https://nuxt.com/) Generation CLI Experience. ## Vision and Roadmap We've rebuilt `nuxi` from the ground up using [unjs/citty](http://github.com/unjs/citty). We have grand plans for this - check out some of the features + roadmap discussions and please feel free to contribute! - Project Goals - Feedbacks and Ideas - The journey of Nuxt CLI Generations ## License [MIT](./LICENSE)
